subject: Action is required to renew your SSL certificate
preview: [image: logo-166x34.png] Kinsta | Application, Database, and Managed WordPress Hosting   Hi Manuel,  The SSL certificate for sosm.com.au will expire on 19 October 2022, 14 days from now.  Wildcard SSL

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
[image: logo-166x34.png]
Kinsta | Application, Database, and Managed WordPress Hosting


Hi Manuel,

The SSL certificate for sosm.com.au will expire on 19 October 2022, 14 days
from now.

Wildcard SSL certificate renewal now requires adding a TXT record to your
domain's DNS. Without the TXT record, the SSL certificate renewal will fail.

Click the button below to view the TXT record for sosm.com.au in MyKinsta.

Get TXT record
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=io4yjLJp1UKTV-2Ft6EmKpBXQddJIndKkjqvzj4ADryUOVLPVY6uxqUg8VW1MbxGb9v2P8iMGZupRdEALYKAoh7jLzE67phiJJSsT7UGkC7mzh0WBlO0HdYD6gGR4KoT55oLtfjuG6jBvKnzDajfR87-2BV-2FKp62v78da-2BxfjWQu8xc76ivpMn0pCJ2PBoQSM1fMRt906rPO7mOUWW3w699VDszj4WKXUUmmKAETI387uYfve800jc0GT4OWJkUY3P-2BW39d3oTOmMpWRwKXK75SwOKXnZQVIV7bjSR3yeTBrDms-3DrInY_nvw3yOs1-2BNrU8Bsg1VlFnYOD5hWT3-2F6i-2BARDVRaZ-2FKvRddR3jimKcmYgo9WPe85BtiTqNfaXUhkjq2zG1evaQ0h-2Bp4cotl-2FYBNzuZgKLrvrJ69h7YhCvJI34TwtVhzUjEa-2Br4C3M4hmUEVNyArCQCQkHGVCkohgoGRTVSTEzyCpilr23UmGDDA5UiDhevYWWhpK48fxQetPUeqebSnHLjOfIoqtRMc2ff3pYs-2B0H4oEibJr8hAq39WepJDZ2OEzX>

Log into your DNS provider to add the new TXT record to your domain (your
DNS provider may be your domain registrar but could also be a third-party
DNS provider). Here's an article that explains how to add DNS TXT records.
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=io4yjLJp1UKTV-2Ft6EmKpBU-2FDGglFWqzLlZsVA46mqhIAs-2Fyl0HpErNCYoJfh8OVEpaz9_nvw3yOs1-2BNrU8Bsg1VlFnYOD5hWT3-2F6i-2BARDVRaZ-2FKvRddR3jimKcmYgo9WPe85Bfo8XV4FD3R9eFtE5jDv7P5s6Hr-2FDhAL5hBOLeJQP-2FK1NVMd6mDGelRsWfkkEOwrymDC6Ebg1Th-2FMkpttXjt0-2B-2BJzEGNqH-2Fiw8-2FFet5tPwPfZOvjSzYL0oaPO-2FQFG2B5qsEjmlp6H8I0yGXn-2FMqQKQ5mhRHkTWV-2ByhJGIWN1RG6YYzpuNMIfSrQklgSsWCKrU>
Contact your domain registrar or DNS provider if you need help adding the
record.

*Did you know that Kinsta's free SSL certificates are verified
automatically when you use Kinsta DNS?*

To activate Kinsta DNS, log in to MyKinsta and click the Kinsta DNS
navigation link. Kinsta DNS is free for every site in your Kinsta account.


- *After activating Kinsta DNS, you'll have to update your domain's name
servers at your registrar.*
- *Kinsta-provided SSL certificates are wildcard certificates and are
not suitable for site configuration that requires the use of non-wildcard
certificates.*

If you have any questions, please open a chat with one of our support team
members. We’re available around the clock and always happy to help!
The Kinsta team
